project.name: Approved Building Permits in Roxbury
project.description: Finda app using City of Boston data on building permits.
project.contact: Please send feedback, ideas, and bug reports to our Github page.

geojson_source: https://data.cityofboston.gov/resource/msk6-43c6.json?$select=owner,address,permitnumber, worktype, permittypedescr, description, applicant, declared_valuation, issued_date, expiration_date, sq_feet, location &$where=city = 'Roxbury' AND owner IS NOT NULL AND status = 'OPEN' &$limit=5
